title: transfering to euw problem

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Ive recently jsut moved over to paris from nz and cant seem to find where im meant to transfer 
screenshot is below was wondering if someone could direct me in the right way 

https://gyazo.com/87050fead79fd5481b2bbc31661ecb36

replies.body:
Minimise your club/friends list on the right side

Drag to the right (so you can see the right side of the shop)

Click the head+toggle button on the right hand side which when you hover says "Account"

There you will find transfers
could you please move to help / support
